snippet: The former secretary of state, who is almost certain to run for president in 2016, should seize this window in the campaign season to elaborate her strategy.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: The former secretary of state, who is almost certain to run for president in 2016, should seize this window in the campaign season to elaborate her strategy.

headline.main: For Hillary Clinton, the Right Time to Get Ready
headline.print_headline: For Hillary Clinton, the Right Time to Get Ready
